extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the world of "Fable Kingdom" where you can build your own city, help legendary heroes with their quests, discover the mysteries of long forgotten times and defeat the evil forces with the power of love and friendship!These features await you:- more than 250 different quests telling you the story of our kingdom- dozens of different buildings to construct- 7 unique characters who will need your help and will repay you in the future- a gigantic map with interesting places to discover and mysterious strangers to meet- hundreds of rewards and achievements along with useful collectible sets of items are waiting for you in this game- Retinaâ¢ quality of graphics and animations- no internet is needed to play this game (except for the initial launch and further updating)- regular updates and special offers. Challenging contests for players in our community on Facebook.Our mysterious and amusing story that will keep you playing until the very end!The story is about to begin right now, and just as all the fairytales beginâ¦Once upon a time, in a far-far away kingdom there lived a Prince. On a nice and pleasant day, he went hunting in the nearest forest and met a beautiful princess. She had been captured by an old witch. He saved her and soon after that  they fell in love with each other. They were just about to get married whenâ¦Out of nowhere the evil witch returned! She came back to take her revenge on the prince and his lovely fiancÃ©! She used her dark magic and turned them into stone statues! The kingdom had lost its rulers and quickly fell into miseryâ¦Century has passed, or maybe even two centuries.No one was left to remember the poor prince and his beloved. Their castle crumbled into ruins and all the citizens left the kingdom in search of a better place to live. It seemed that there was no place for happiness in these lands anymoreâ¦But a lucky coincidence brought hope to the kingdom! A little fairy found the prince's statue and removed the curse from it! Too bad it didn't work for his beloved Aliceâ¦ Now it's time for Prince and his friends to save the princess and bring the kingdom back to its glory days! And it's YOU, who is going to help them!

reviews.title: Fable Kingdom HD
reviews.comment: Such a fun and awesome game to play. Easily one of the best games I\'ve downloaded
reviews.author: Nichola King

reviews.title: The game has potential but!!!
reviews.comment: This game looks good but its to slow gaining items to improve in the game. Everything is priced, money hungry. .be careful everyone. .and it doesn\'t record s to your email\' so if you invest and then change your phone. your re-downloaded game starts from scratch.
reviews.author: lizzette paulino

reviews.title: Was a Great game
reviews.comment: Latest update killed it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to change my rating, unable to transfer to new phone. Spent too much money & gotten too far to start over..
reviews.author: Tamika Kemp

reviews.title: Update game won\'t load
reviews.comment: Was a great game. I\'ll change my rating when game works again. After update game only loads 2/3 of the way then freezes. Help!!! I was almost level 30 and spent real money, now i can\'t play. Please fix.
reviews.author: Dusty Sargent

reviews.comment: I loved the game before the last update, now it won\'t load at all. Please fix and I\'ll change my rating back to 5 stars!
reviews.author: Kari Ellis

reviews.title: Game don\'t work
reviews.comment: It keep kicking me off the game on both of my phones can u please fix it so I can play it
reviews.author: Nakisha Williams

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: It\'s not my favorite game but it\'s making me forget that I\'m bored
reviews.author: Cayla Snelling

reviews.title: Update error
reviews.comment: I updated the game 2hrs ago and after that the game won\'t start. Loading stops at around 2/3.
reviews.author: June Hwang

reviews.title: Great game but!
reviews.comment: Its a great game but I can\'t play it as much as I want to because it wount let me advance as much my castle is still in level one and I can\'t do many quest.
reviews.author: CM PPG

reviews.title: Please fix what i say
reviews.comment: It is awsome game but the mervelious well buy with crystal and and somethings are buy with lots of crystals if they fix it i will give 100000 star my friens also said that too
reviews.author: Aryan Rahman

reviews.title: Fable kingdom hd
reviews.comment: Is very good game am enjoying it at moment is first HD game used
reviews.author: Carole Glover

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: It\'s free, the gems aren\'t hard to get, it isn\'t internet based so if you have a bad signal it won\'t lose your progress, and most importantly it\'s fun. :)
reviews.author: Phylicia S.

reviews.title: So. ....
reviews.comment: I broke my fone got a new one and had to start over from the beginning this is really annoying because I had made it to $700,000. for 1 things move slo on the game so i know its going to  take a lot to get bk to where I was and that I did not like citizen that the game is amazing. Wr should be able to save progress no matter what through Facebook. .
reviews.author: Kianee Manning

reviews.title: Very disappointed...
reviews.comment: I used to love this game until recent update and adjusting of my gem total(that was first annoying thing) and now with newest update I can\'t even play game at all. Whats going on... Atleast I am not alone in this... Can see from other reviewers same thing is happening to alot of people... So aggravated(all above mentioned irrating occurences happened in last week)
reviews.author: Andrea Juskalian

reviews.title: Not to bad.........
reviews.comment: Would be great if it would incorporate the s-pen for the Galaxy Note 2. I definitely will play this at my own leisure. Gam mes like this tend to get too greedy if you start spending money. I did uninstall it though.
reviews.author: Michael Modestino Jr

reviews.title: Very addictive!
reviews.comment: Best game I\'ve discovered so far.
reviews.author: chris silvius

reviews.title: It\'s a good game
reviews.comment: Nice graphic and I haven\'t gotten board yet
reviews.author: Sandra McGettigan

reviews.title: Very fun.
reviews.comment: I love this game. It is so much fun I can barely put it down. Great job, devs.
reviews.author: Katrina Lynn

reviews.title: Update ruined my game!
reviews.comment: It will not do anything now that you updated it.  What a shame of a good game. It keeps freezing...I paid for gems I cannot use now!  Why is every update such a problem!  fix it and it gets 5stars!
reviews.author: Deb Burgess
